text:
Theatre

Interview: The Magic Mike Live dancers on the unique West End show | Ticketmaster UK

Watch this video on YouTube

Tom Stafford / 4th March 2020

Interview

Find out more about Magic Mike Live from its dancers

Meet Aaron Witter, Pip Hersee and Harry Carter as the unique experience extends to 13 September 2020.

Find tickets here

Magic Mike Live has extended its London run until 13 September 2020, with thousands of tickets for the new performances available now.

Grab yours through Ticketmaster.co.uk.

To celebrate the extension, check out our interview with dancers Aaron Witter, Pip Hersee and Harry Carter above, who took time out of their busy schedule to open up about the show, what they love about starring in it, and just what audiences can expect from Magic Mike Live.

The full cast of Magic Mile Live includes Daniel Blessing, Theo Oloyade Samantha Baines, Courtenay Brady, Jake Brewer, Harry Carter, Ellie Clayton, Pip Hersee, Matt Jordan, Sophie Linder-Lee, Jack Manley, David Morgan, Ross Sands, Josie Scamell, Manny Tsakanika and Aaron Witter from the United Kingdom, Mark Lace from New Zealand, Tylah Paterson from Australia, Edson Juarez from the USA, and Anthony Donadio from Italy.

Conceived and co-directed by Channing Tatum – the original star of the iconic Magic Mike film and its sequel Magic Mike XXL – Magic Mike Live is large-scale live production that brings the passion of the original movies to life before your very eyes.

Magic Mike Live has transformed the theatre at the Hippodrome into a magical, intimate, 325-seat performance space. From the bespoke entrance off Cranbourn Street, to the specially curated lounge and bar experience, to the cast of world-class performers, Magic Mike Live is a complete evening of unparalleled entertainment for those aged 18 and up.

Guests enter Magic Mike’s mythical club and marvel as a group of extraordinary artists perform a 360-degree dance and acrobatic spectacular in front of, behind, and above them. Sexy dance routines are intertwined with one-of-a-kind acts presented by a diverse cast of performers from around the world.

Take a sneak peek below:

Magic Mike Live is the perfect girls' night out | Ticketmaster UK

Watch this video on YouTube

Reviews have called the production “red hot magic” (Metro), “a feverish spectacle” (Evening Standard), and “a huge hit” (WhatsOnStage). “The sexiest, steamiest show in town,” says The Sun, adding that “these lads will make your dreams come true”.

“The audience seem nothing less than ecstatic throughout”, notes The Independent, with The Stage declaring it “a spectacle hot enough to leave the streaming crowd momentarily breathless”.

Magic Mike Live in London is co-directed by Channing Tatum and Alison Faulk and choreographed by Alison Faulk, Teresa Espinoza and Luke Broadlick.

It cleverly straddles the line between sultry and acrobatic, pairing impressive dance with a healthy dose of sex appeal.

The show is now open at The Theatre at the Hippodrome.

Please note: Magic Mike Live guests must be at least 18 years to attend – appropriate photo ID will be requested on arrival at the venue.

Group bookings

There are special rates available for Magic Mike Live when making a booking of over 6 people.

To book for 6 – 9 people head to Ticketmaster.co.uk

To book for groups of 10 or more, call our groups team on 0844 844 2121 or email groups@ticketmaster.co.uk

Magic Mike Live is now booking until 13 September 2020. Tickets for the new dates are available now through Ticketmaster.co.uk.
